history.title: Our History
history.description: CRZ Clinic was born in 2024 from the shared dream of four mental health professionals committed to transforming psychological and psychiatric care in our community.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that mental health is fundamental to a fulfilling life. We are dedicated to providing comprehensive, personalized, and evidence-based care.

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: We understand that each story is unique and deserves to be heard with respect and compassion.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We maintain the highest professional standards in all our services.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We incorporate the latest therapeutic techniques and approaches supported by science.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: We guarantee the privacy and security of each patient at all times.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We work to make mental health accessible to all people.

francisco.name: Dr. Francisco Baghdadi
francisco.description: Psychiatrist with more than 15 years of experience in mood disorders and anxiety.

nicolas.name: Dr. Nicolas Al-Masri
nicolas.description: Clinical psychologist specialist in cognitive-behavioral therapy and couple therapy.

malena.name: Dr. Malena Haddad
malena.description: Child and adolescent psychologist with focus on systemic family therapy.

lara.name: Dr. Lara Al-Fayed
lara.description: Clinical neuropsychologist specialized in cognitive assessment and rehabilitation.

services.title: Our Services
services.service1: Psychiatric Consultations: Evaluation, diagnosis and pharmacological treatment
services.service2: Individual Therapy: Personalized approach for adults, adolescents and children
services.service3: Couple and Family Therapy: Strengthening bonds and conflict resolution
services.service5: Group Programs: Specialized group therapy by themes
